General.Name: Al-Rajhi Cooperative Insurance
General.Description: Al Rajhi Company for Cooperative Insurance provides various insurance products and services to individuals, SMEs, and corporates in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates in four segments: Medical, Motor, Property and casualty, and Protection and Savings. It offers engineering, motor, unified health, domestic helper, travel, medical malpractice, visitor visa, personal accident, general SME, and life insurance products. The company also provides liability, contractors risk, marine cargo, plant machinery, machinery breakdown, erection all risk insurance, and protection and savings products. In addition, it is involved in the re-takaful/re-insurance and agency activities. Al Rajhi Company for Cooperative Insurance was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
